meanings: (떨어지지 않게) stick, attach, (formal) affix, (풀로) paste, glue

vlive.korean: 야 땅에 붙여야 되겠다! You better stick it to the ground! 듣기 View video ASTRO : 초콜릿스트로🍫
vlive.english: You better stick it to the ground!

vlive.korean: 이거 일부러 붙여놓은 거야? Did you put this together on purpose? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 따나의 얼렁뚱땅 초코츄러스 만들기🐥🍫
vlive.english: Did you put this together on purpose?

vlive.korean: 근데 붙여도 안 된다 이거~ But...Even if you do, it's not working out. 듣기 View video ASTRO : 초콜릿스트로🍫
vlive.english: But...Even if you do, it's not working out.

vlive.korean: 제가 스티커 갖다가 붙인 거예요 예쁘죠? I put the stickers on here. It's pretty, right? 듣기 View video ITZY : 🖤
vlive.english: I put the stickers on here. It's pretty, right?

vlive.korean: 나 좋아하는 색깔로 - 나 그럼 스티커만 붙여도 되나? My favorite color. - Then can I just put on stickers? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] DREAMCATCHER X Rooftop Live - 드림캐쳐의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: My favorite color. - Then can I just put on stickers?

examples.korean: She glued the label onto the box. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 상자에 라벨을 붙였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She glued the label onto the box. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He put name tags on all his shirts. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 자기 셔츠 모두에 이름표를 붙였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He put name tags on all his shirts. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He pasted the pictures into his scrapbook. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그 사진들을 자기 스크랩북에 풀로 붙였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He pasted the pictures into his scrapbook. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My brother was snoozing on the sofa. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리 형[오빠/남동생]은 소파에서 잠깐 눈을 붙이고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My brother was snoozing on the sofa. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The label should be firmly affixed to the package. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 꾸러미에는 꼬리표를 단단히 붙여야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The label should be firmly affixed to the package. Add to Wordbook
